titleStmt.title: These are to give you notice, that by vertue of an ordinance the 27 of October last, you are assessed to lend the summe of [blank] of lawfull English money, to bee paid for our brethren of Scotland ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: These are to give you notice, that by vertue of an ordinance the 27 of October last, you are assessed to lend the summe of [blank] of lawfull English money, to bee paid for our brethren of Scotland ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
A form intended to be used in the fulfillment of the ordinance of 27 October 1644.
Place of publication from Wing, which dates this item 1693; publication date conjectured by cataloger.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
